import{useState,useEffect}from"react";import ParticleCanvas from"./components/ParticleCanvas";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function App(){const[stage,setStage]=useState("bigbang");const[paused,setPaused]=useState(false);// 단계 자동 전환
useEffect(()=>{if(paused)return;let timer;if(stage==="bigbang")timer=setTimeout(()=>setStage("atom_formation"),5000);else if(stage==="atom_formation")timer=setTimeout(()=>setStage("galaxy_formation"),5000);else if(stage==="galaxy_formation")timer=setTimeout(()=>setStage("solar_system"),5000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);},[stage,paused]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{position:"fixed",top:10,left:10,zIndex:10},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Stage: ",stage]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setPaused(!paused),children:paused?"Resume":"Pause"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ParticleCanvas,{stage:stage,paused:paused})]});}
